name: Unmotivated
description:
A game by Ryan Whitney. A game for hopeless people.

In Unmotivated, you take on the role of a university student attempting to finish the final project for one of their classes. It's very meta.

You will battle the ever-present and ever-more-interesting ability to procrastinate, over making any actual progress on your project. You will do things you don't even mean to do. You might pass. You will probably fail.
